title: Changing Legal Landscape for Cannabis Products
itunes:title: Changing Legal Landscape for Cannabis Products
description:
Jason Wilson, Cannabis Banking and Research Expert at ETFMG, discusses the timing for investing in cannabis as more states move towards legalization.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
